Moving to UI, problem could be same or related to bug 46562.  Note that bug 
46562 is marked fixed as of yesterday.

The initial hang may be bug 46562 although it was a problem running the java 
test suites.

The more interesting issue is how the workbench can start up outside of the UI 
Thread. This code is now obsolete (org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run has 
been deleted so this will not happen post 20031111. 

I will keep this problem report open as the refactoring may not have taken 
care of the problem.

Closing as I beleive this was fixed for M5. Please reopen if you get this post 
M5.
